p: The oxidation of 50 g butter in 125 ml enclosed glass cups was controlled via evaluating the formation of hydroperoxides at 63 Â°C. The level of hydroperoxide was evaluated as PV with regard to the procedure of the American Oil Chemists' Society ( AOCS, 1986). CPV (%) = 100(PV2-PV1)/PV1Where PV1 is peroxide value at the start of the experiment and PV2 is peroxide value at the last part of the test.
